dúlì independent; independence; to stand alone
zhīchí to be in favor of; to support; to back; support; backing; to stand by

traditional: 曾經
céngjīng once; already; former; previously; (past tense marker used before verb or clause)

traditional: 各級
gèjí all levels
chénggōng success; to succeed

traditional: 無論
wúlùn no matter what or how; regardless of whether...

traditional: 現代
xiàndài modern times; modern age; modern era; Hyundai, South Korean company

traditional: 現實
xiànshí reality; actuality; real; actual
rénjīa other people

traditional: 大隊
dàduì group; a large body of; production brigade

traditional: 自動
zìdòng automatic

traditional: 別人
biérén other people; others; other person

traditional: 相應
xiāngyìng relevant; corresponding (reaction)

traditional: 十萬
shíwàn hundred thousand

traditional: 可見
kějiàn it can clearly be seen (that this is the case); it is (thus) clear; clear; visible

zuòzhě author; writer
zuózhě author
